description: XMCT In the traditional medical environment, individual users have no direct control over their medical records and do not realize the value of personal medical information. Users of the medical information cannot guarantee the authenticity of the information obtained. The future of medical data should be transparent and open, which leads to the concept of XMCT (XMCT). XMCT will be circulated in the XMC ecosystem, designed for all users who contribute to a harmonious and shared economic ecology. Under no circumstances would holders of the XMCT be entitled to any management rights of the XMC and XMCT, any rights to dividends and profits generated from the XMC and by XMC and any interests in XMC for holding the XMCT.
name: XMED Chain Token
